message: Let's start with this fair offer, Bob.  I believe getting a larger share now is in your best interest considering the inflation.
I understand the inflation is affecting us both. This offer is more balanced for both of us.
Bob, this deal benefits us both, though I get slightly more. Let's settle this before the inflation eats away at your gains.
Alice, the inflation is hurting me more than you.  I need a larger share to make this worthwhile. Let's close this deal.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but time is running out. This is my final offer. Take it before inflation eats up more of your potential gains.
